argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mirval.p | |- P = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | mirval.d | |- .- = ( dist ` G ) |
| 3 |  | mirval.i | |- I = ( Itv ` G ) |
| 4 |  | mirval.l | |- L = ( LineG ` G ) |
| 5 |  | mirval.s | |- S = ( pInvG ` G ) |
| 6 |  | mirval.g | |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) |
| 7 |  | mirval.a | |- ( ph -> A e. P ) |
| 8 |  | mirfv.m | |- M = ( S ` A ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 | #P_mirf | |- ( ph -> M : P --> P ) |
| 10 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( M : P --> P -> M Fn P ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> M Fn P ) |
| 12 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ a e. P ) -> G e. TarskiG ) |
| 13 | 7 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ a e. P ) -> A e. P ) |
| 14 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ a e. P ) -> a e. P ) |
| 15 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 12, 13, 8, 14 | #P_mirmir | |- ( ( ph /\ a e. P ) -> ( M ` ( M ` a ) ) = a ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ph -> A. a e. P ( M ` ( M ` a ) ) = a ) |
| 17 |  | #P_nvocnv | |- ( ( M : P --> P /\ A. a e. P ( M ` ( M ` a ) ) = a ) -> `' M = M ) |
| 18 | 9, 16, 17 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> `' M = M ) |
| 19 |  | #P_nvof1o | |- ( ( M Fn P /\ `' M = M ) -> M : P -1-1-onto-> P ) |
| 20 | 11, 18, 19 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> M : P -1-1-onto-> P ) |
